name: Joshua Davidov Prototypes (ChangeOfSeason/SpaceHammy/SpaceMan/SpaceBoom)
description:
Prototype #1 - Change Of Season

This is a prototype game created with Processing. This game isn't functional, but it gives you an idea of my initial game plan/idea.

Prototype #2- SpaceHammy

The player is a hamster with the ability to control the gravity. The player will be able to float up and down, but be careful,  changing the gravity  affects the objects around you. If an object touches you, you will POSITIVELY DIE! Hamsters and furniture's are not a great mix.

Prototype  #3- SpaceMan

The space man's mission is to collect all 4 cards on the screen while  avoiding  the alien chasing  you. Collecting all the cards is your secret weapon to annihilate all alien existences. After collecting all the cards, you must get REVENGE on the alien, and kill him before he escapes.  

Prototype #4 - SpaceBoom

On earth we have "Sonic Boom" ( the sound that is associated with the shock waves created when an object travels through the air faster than the speed of sound). In space we have "Space Boom". Use your powerful voice to shoot the enemies coming towards you.
